title: Looking to purchase Chief Meyers Colored S74 Silks

posts.post_title: Looking to purchase Chief Meyers Colored S74 Silks
posts.post_content:
If anyone has any Chief Meyers S74s for sale, please email me at [url]vintagecatcher@myfairpoint.net[/url]. 

At present, I'm only collecting his S74s, and I do not have any others for trade.

Thanks,


Patrick
